mele&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:{&quot;path&quot;:&quot;\/user\/subscriptions&quot;,&quot;desktop_base&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.emag.ro&quot;,&quot;mobile_base&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/m.emag.ro&quot;},&quot;ref&quot;:&quot;subscriptions&quot;,&quot;flags&quot;:{&quot;is_selected&quot;:false,&quot;has_label&quot;:false},&quot;label&quot;:&quot;&quot;}],&quot;user_data&quot;:{&quot;id&quot;:7929342,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Test&quot;,&quot;abbreviation&quot;:&quot;T&quot;,&quot;email&quot;:&quot;moldiradul@gmail.com&quot;,&quot;avatar&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/s12emagst.akamaized.net\/layout\/ro\/images\/new\/account\/avatar\/3.jpg&quot;,&quot;user_avatar&quot;:{&quot;initials&quot;:&quot;T&quot;,&quot;background_color&quot;:&quot;#9c27b0&quot;},&quot;gdpr_age_status&quot;:1,&quot;created_on&quot;:&quot;2019-08-14T12:47:08+0300&quot;,&quot;last_login&quot;:&quot;2019-08-14T15:26:19+0300&quot;,&quot;education_level&quot;:0,&quot;flags&quot;:{&quot;has_agreed_to_share_wishlists&quot;:false},&quot;labels&quot;:[],&quot;linked_accounts&quot;:[],&quot;edit_avatar_url&quot;:{&quot;path&quot;:&quot;\/user\/ajax\/upload&quot;,&quot;desktop_base&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/www.emag.ro&quot;,&quot;mobile_base&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/m.emag.ro&quot;}}}">
<input type="hidden" class="em-vars" name="username" value="test">
<input type="hidden" class="em-vars" name="send_sms_token" value="<input type=&quot;hidden&quot; name=&quot;action_token&quot; value=&quot;4ce9fc2f20e7aae4633049b09719975946be1d05&quot; />"><script>
    EM.user_token = "";
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var activeAbs = {};

window.user_labels = '{"customerName":"test","labels":[]}';

function runAb(name) {
    if ( !activeAbs || !activeAbs[name] ) {
        return null;
    }
    try {
        var cookie_val = PH.cookie.get("aboption");
        if (cookie_val) {
            cookie_val = decodeURIComponent(cookie_val);
        }
        var abOpt = JSON.parse(cookie_val);
    } catch (e) {}

    if ( abOpt && abOpt[name] && activeAbs[name][abOpt[name]] ) {
        return abOpt[name];
    }
    var currentOpt = generateAb(activeAbs[name]);
    if ( currentOpt ) {
        recordAB(abOpt, name, currentOpt);
    }
    return currentOpt;
}

function recordAB(abOpt, name, currentOpt) {
    if ( !abOpt ) {
        abOpt = {};
    } else {
        for (opt in abOpt) {
            if ( !activeAbs[opt] ) {
                delete abOpt[opt];
            }
        };
    }

    abOpt[name] = currentOpt;
    PH.cookie.set(
            'aboption',
            encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(abOpt)),
            30,
            '/',
            '.emag.ro'
    );

    reqwest({
        url: EM.old_site_endpoint + "/ablogger.php?name=" + name + "&value=" + currentOpt + "&source=www",
        data: {},
        method: 'GET',
        type: 'json',
        crossOrigin: true
    });
}

function generateAb(distribution) {
    var limit = 0;
    var rnd = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100 + 1);
    var curOpt = lastOpt = null;

    for (index in distribution) {
        lastOpt = index;
        limit += parseFloat(distribution[index]);
        if ( rnd <= limit ) {
            curOpt = index;
            break;
        }
    }

    if ( curOpt ) {
        return curOpt;
    } else {
        return lastOpt;
    }
}

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
    //run ab here, ex: runAb(12);
});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">    
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(event) {
        var voucherData = PH.cookie.get("voucher_notification");                
        if (voucherData){            
            try{
                voucherData = decodeURIComponent(voucherData).replace(/\+/g, ' ');
                voucherData = JSON.parse(voucherData);

                if (voucherData.id && EM.show_voucher_notification_in_page) {
                    EM.AdminNotificationsManager.disableNotificationForShown(voucherData.id);
                }

                var voucherNotificationMsg = voucherData.message,
                    notificationName = voucherData.name;
                
                new EM.Notification({
                    position: 'top right',
                    message : voucherNotificationMsg,
                    icon: 'em em-voucher',
                    ttl: false,
                    className: 'voucher-response-notification',
                    onOpen: function(e){
                        var trackingString = "";
                        if (voucherData.id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.id+'_';
                        }
                        if (voucherData.campaign_id){
                            trackingString += voucherData.campaign_id+'_';
                        }
                        if (notificationName){
                            trackingString += notificationName;
                        }
                        dataLayer.push({event: 'voucher_tooltip_click', ec: "ToolTip", ea: "campanie_"+trackingString, el: "Display campanie_" + trackingString});                        
                    }
                });

                PH.cookie.set('voucher_notification','',-1,'/',window.cookie_domain || EM.cookie_domain);
            }catch(e){
            }
        }        
    })
</script>
</div>
    </div>
</nav>

        <section class="page-section  is-flash-deals " style="background: #f0280a">
            <a id="flash_deals" class="scroll-anchor"></a>
            <div class="container">
                <h2 class="page-section-title clearfix"><span class="js-section-title">Flash Deals</span>
                    
                        <a href="/cmp/outlet-corner-19-august/?ref=hp_prod_widget_flash_deals_see_details" class="font-size-md view-offer-flash-deals">vezi oferta</a>
                    
                    
                    
                        <div class="countdown-timer pull-right">
                            <div class="flip-countdown countdown-sm countdown-white" data-countdown="1566219600"><div class="flip-block"><div class="flip-count">0</div><div class="flip-count">5</div><span class="flip-label">ore</span></div><div class="flip-divider"></div><div class="flip-block"><div class="flip-count">0</div><div class="flip-count">7</div><span class="flip-label">minute</span></div><div class="flip-divider"></div><div class="flip-block"><div class="flip-count">5</div><div class="flip-count">0</div><span class="flip-label">secunde</span></div></div>
                        </div>
                    
                </h2>

    <div class="container pad-sep-xs"><div class="widget-newsletter">
    <div class="panel pad-hrz-md mrg-btm-none">
        <div class="widget-newsletter-content">
            <h3 class="mrg-btm-sm">Abonează-te la newsletter eMAG și află de reducerile cu timp limitat!</h3>

                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group form-group-sm col-md-4">
                        <label class="sr-only">Email</label>
                        <input type="email" name="email" class="form-control" placeholder="Email" required="" data-v-email="">

                </div>
                <div class="row">

                    <p class="product-new-price"></p></div></div></div>

      	color: #FFFFFF;
      	top: 8%;
      	left: 3.3%;
      	font-size: 14px;
      	font-weight: bold;
  	}
  
  @media (min-width: 480px) {
    .gtm-user-label {
      	font-size: 20px;
    }
  }
  
  @media (min-width: 768px) {
    .gtm-user-label {
      	font-size: 28px;
    }
  }
  	
  @media (min-width: 992px) {
    .gtm-user-label {
      	top: 17%;
      	font-size: 35px;
    }
  }
  
  @media (min-width: 1260px) {
    .gtm-user-label {
      	top: 8%;
    }
  }
</style>
